Uses of Class
com.google.cloud.firestore.TransactionOptions

  • Packages that use TransactionOptions 
    Package Description
    com.google.cloud.firestore  

    • Uses of TransactionOptions in com.google.cloud.firestore

      Methods in com.google.cloud.firestore that return TransactionOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TransactionOptions TransactionOptions.create()
      Create a default set of options suitable for most use cases.
      static TransactionOptions TransactionOptions.create(Executor executor)
      Create a default set of options with a custom executor.
      static TransactionOptions TransactionOptions.create(Executor executor, int numberOfAttempts)
      Create a default set of options with a custom executor and a custom number of retry attempts.
      static TransactionOptions TransactionOptions.create(int numberOfAttempts)
      Create a default set of options with a custom number of retry attempts.
      Methods in com.google.cloud.firestore with parameters of type TransactionOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> com.google.api.core.ApiFuture<T> Firestore.runTransaction(Transaction.Function<T> updateFunction, TransactionOptions transactionOptions)
      Executes the given updateFunction and then attempts to commit the changes applied within the transaction.
